snippet.title: True Colours Trailer 3
snippet.description:
True Colours is the brand new romance/horror visual novel by Borealis Games - a dating sim with a DARK twist! 💔

Just when you thought your uneventful office job couldn't get any more boring, three new hires appear!  They're cute (oh no, he's hot!), they're single (it helps) and they're ready for romance!  But little do they know that there’s another face behind that friendly façade of yours…  and it ain’t pretty.

What would you do if YOU were the villain?  It's time to find out  😈

True Colours is now available on Steam and Itch!

⭐ Official Twitter:  https://twitter.com/VenusImprobable
⭐ Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2205230/True_Colours
⭐ Itchio:  https://borealisgames.itch.io/true-colours
⭐ Consoles:  Coming soon!

--

Heart Tunnel graphic by: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qoew2OBW-Wc 
Hearts graphic by Miguel Á. Padriñán on Pexels
Music track by Romansenykmusic on Pixabay
